name: Hysteria Project
description:
In “HYSTERIA PROJECT”, YOU are the hero! Step into the shoes of the main character and take part in an unforgettable adventure! Will you make the right decisions and make it out in one piece?

Hysteria Project is a groundbreaking gaming experience where you are the hero of an entirely filmed adventure. Keep a sharp eye on what’s going on around you and most importantly of all – make the right choices at the right time.

Recommended for fans of new experiences and thrill-seekers.

Have you got the guts to be next on the list?
